body:
Hello guys, i was checking the store because i was interested in donating, but i saw there is some overrated prices (for me). 
I know every network owners deserve the reason of why set that prices, and sometimes we know how expensive is afford a network like this. But it think the prices are a little bit high for some latin american users.

For example, if you are mexican and want to buy the Diamond Lifetime package you have to pay
$89.99 (without discount) = 1800 pesos, you must be rich to spend that money in a cubes game, i mean you can buy a lot of things with these 1800 pesos. Otherwise, with the discount will be $53.99 = 1080 pesos, is still a very high amount.

I'm not here to compare networks or anything like that, but just, check this;
Hypixel, a 30k online players have a really accessible shop, they use Paymentwall, you can pay with any payment method and their prices are really accessibles. So to be honest it worth pay $18 - $70, and basically they are always on discount, so the prices are always like %80 off discount and the prices become to $6 - $30.

Anyways its only my opinion, if you agree or disagree just tell here and we can discuss it friendly!

-Coded

title: Is the shop overrated?

replies.body: overpriced* not overrated
replies.body_tagged: overpriced* not overrated

replies.body:
Well that's kind of a loaded question. Yes, there are prices that people may view as overpriced, but you have to look at what the money goes to. Hypixel has thousands of players buying ranks, so they don't need expensive ranks, since money keeps flowing in.

For Avicus, the ranks are more expensive, yes, and I'll be the first to admit that I'd be a little bit reluctant to spend $89.99 USD for lifetime diamond, but the fact is that the prices reflect the cost of running the server. I'm not sure if there is a good way to fix it.
replies.body_tagged:
Well that's kind of a loaded question. Yes, there are prices that people may view as overpriced, but you have to look at what the money goes to. Hypixel has thousands of players buying ranks, so they don't need expensive ranks, since money keeps flowing in.

For Avicus, the ranks are more expensive, yes, and I'll be the first to admit that I'd be a little bit reluctant to spend $89.99 USD for lifetime diamond, but the fact is that the prices reflect the cost of running the server. I'm not sure if there is a good way to fix it.

replies.body:
Again, this works in theory, and only to an extent. At some point the correlation of lower prices and high purchases weakens. If the prices right now can support the server (can they?), it is a risk to change it. 

Don't get my intentions wrong, I'd like it if more people felt comfortable buying ranks, but I want to be able to see this discussion from all angles
replies.body_tagged:

Don't get my intentions wrong, I'd like it if more people felt comfortable buying ranks, but I want to be able to see this discussion from all angles
